content: चमसः, --सं [चमत्यस्मिन्, चम्-असच् <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} A vessel (can, ladle &c.) used at sacrifices for drinking the Soma juice; <ls>Y. 1. 183</ls> (also चमसी). {@--2@} A cake made of barley, rice &c.

चमसः, --सं [चमत्यस्मिन्, चम्-असच् <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} A vessel (can, ladle &c.) used at sacrifices for drinking the Soma juice; <ls>Y. 1. 183</ls> (also चमसी). {@--2@} A cake made of barley, rice &c.
